Description_lang: Throws a hammer at your target dealing $s1 Holy damage, and empowering your next $?c3[Templar's Verdict to automatically trigger Divine Storm]?c1[Word of Glory to automatically trigger Light of Dawn][Word of Glory to automatically trigger Shield of the Righteous] with $s2% increased effectiveness.|cFFFFFFFFGenerates $s3 Holy Power.
